item.description:
Boston AREIA

Get your real estate courses at a discount!

Bid on an opportunity to donate to Rosie’s Place,a sanctuary for poor and homeless women in Boston. Boston AREIA especially supports this non-profit because of it’s dedication to prevention of homelessness and eviction. Their homelessness prevention initiatives, such as rental assistance and support services, provide families the help they need to stay in their homes.

If you donate to Rosie’s Place, you’ll get free real estate investing courses and bootcamps donated by national speakers and our own members!

We have course from Than Merrill and Paul Esajian, Tony Youngs and many more!

Last year, BAREIA members raised over $8,000 for Rosie’s Place!

Are you aware of all the benefits of being a member of Boston AREIA?

For all Turning the Key members, Boston AREIA is offering a 25% discount on all regular memberships. This does not include the Associated REIA membership which gives you access to 8 different groups and 10 meetings per month. Please visit Boston AREIA then call Bernadette at 603-505-8683 to apply discount.

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Boston AREIA Christmas in July Charity Auction for Rosie's Place
